description: This file defines an Angular component named FiltersToolbarComponent, which provides a reusable toolbar UI element with optional label slot and content projection for start and end content. It includes input and output properties for interaction.

classes.name: FiltersToolbarComponent
classes.description: An Angular standalone component providing a filters toolbar with slots for custom content and an optional label. It emits events when filter state changes.

methods.name: filterChanged
methods.description: An EventEmitter that emits events when filter states change.
